source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: How to develop empathy
items.headline: The world is a better place with empathy!
objectives_summary: How to develop empathy
Why some people don't show empathy
Learning the habits of empathetic people

items.title: Speak2Win - Learn How to Influence People in Just 7 Hours
items.headline: Influence Anyone at Will. Build Instant Rapport & Trust. Use Positive Affirmations and make your Unconscious your Friend
objectives_summary: Influencing anyone at Will
Advance Communication Skills
How to build instant Rapport & Trust

items.title: How To Become A Successful Social Media Influencer In 2021
items.headline: The Fastest Way To Start Your INFLUENCER CAREER! Learn How To Become A HYPER Social Media INFLUENCER MARKETER Today!
objectives_summary: Leverage TikTok, Instagram & Youtube for profits!
How to set up your profile the RIGHT way!
How to build your strategy for maximum profits!

items.title: How to be a great TEDx Speaker?
items.headline: Learn to Master Your Skills to be a Great TEDx Speaker.
objectives_summary: The confidence. I can do it!

items.title: Verbal Defense
items.headline: Learn The Language Patterns of Self Defense And Never Be Insulted, Manipulated or Taken Advantage of Again
objectives_summary: Verbal Skills to Defend Against and Defeat Insults
Techniques To Increase Self Confidence
Social and Communication Skills

items.title: Test Your Personality Using The DISC Assessment Tool
items.headline: Persuade, motivate and inspire others by understanding their personality!
objectives_summary: A better understanding of your personality type
Communication skills with different types of personalities
Leadership, sales and relationships skills

items.title: The Power of Persuasion
items.headline: How to get ahead and make people do what you want in 9 handy tips
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know how to get people to do what you want.
You will learn 9 most powerful techniques of persuasion
You will learn how to make people do small favors for you

items.title: Communication Skills for Beginners
items.headline: Everything you want to know about how to EXACTLY communicate like a pro even if you don''t know anything about it
objectives_summary: Know what is communication and what is purpose of communication
Understand the types of communication so that you will know what is the best suitable medium for you to communicate
Learn exactly how to minimize or eliminate misunderstanding by understanding the process of communication

items.title: NLP: Build Instant Rapport With Anyone In 10 Seconds or Less

visible_instructors.title: Andreas Dorn
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified NLP-, Hypnosis-, NLP Coach Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Andreas

items.headline: Use NLP and newest Neurological Research to Create Instant Connections with anyone to accelerate your success to the max
objectives_summary: Build deep rapport with anyone, instantly, and effectively
Know the difference between different rapport-building tools and use them anytime, anywhere
Feel good about yourself, knowing that you can connect with anyone, anywhere

items.title: Introduction to Listening Skills.
items.headline: Learn how to become an effective helpful listener in relationships, at work or as an introduction to counselling.
objectives_summary: Listen actively, effectively and helpfully to others.
Develop understanding of the use and purpose of basic listening skills.
Grow in confidence as a helpful listener.

items.title: How to Start a Medical Podcast  (A Systems-Based Approach)

visible_instructors.title: Joe Muench
visible_instructors.job_title: Podcaster, Author, and Critical Care Pharmacist
visible_instructors.name: Joe

items.headline: A step-by-step course to create and launch your own free open access medical education (FOAM) podcast
objectives_summary: When you’re done with this course, you’ll have what it takes to successfully launch your podcast.
I'll be there to support you throughout the course.
I’ve vetted the most cost-effective equipment & software so that your podcast has excellent production quality for minimal cost.

items.title: Personal Branding Formula: Your Content Strategy [in 60 min]
items.headline: 90 day blueprint to grow Your Digital Influence
objectives_summary: How to get Personal Clarity before You start building Your Influence
The 3 P's of Positioning Yourself in the Digital World
How to Find a Hungry Market in your Field [Niche]

items.title: Lie; Lie Detection; Face Reading Of Micro Expressions
items.headline: Training In Face Reading Through Facial Expressions; Master Micro Expressions
objectives_summary: Learn What Micro Expressions Are
Learn Face Reading
What Do Those Facial Expressions Mean?

items.title: Negotiate Anything - Master Negotiation Skills From Scratch
items.headline: To People Who Want To Learn Negotiation But Can't Get Started This Is The Only Negotiation Course You Ever Need.
objectives_summary: You'll learn about the "True" Meaning of Negotiation
You'll understand why negotiation is learnable skill
You'll understand and master the mindset of excellent negotiators

visible_instructors.name: Bhavna

items.headline: Master your sales, negotiations, presentations, interviews, leadership skills by the impact of your body language
objectives_summary: Make use of body language as an effective way to boost up your career
Understand and connect better with people, personally as well as professionally
Crack sales better by gaining a better understanding of your client, and creating good rapport using body language

items.title: Public Speaking Contests: You Can Win

objectives_summary: Win a public speaking contest
